item.title: A small little idea, would it work?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

So i want to make sure this works before i make it on my server:

if (command.startsWith("home") && inWildy == false; { teleportToX = THE X POS; teleportToY = THE Y POS; sendMessage("Home Sweet Home !"); } else if inWildy == true { sendMessage("You can not teleport home when you are in wildy silly gooze :P"); }

Really would be cool if it would, but i just want to know if i did everything right before i try it on

Read full topic
item.source: A small little idea, would it work?
